content: pop on over for the written pattern and video tutorial for my stretchy coffee sleeve this video tutorial is more than just a stitch tutorial read the blog post to find the free crochet pattern and learn more about what the video includes stitches techniques & tips watch the video tutorial to add a few new tricks to your crocheter s toolbox **~pattern pack discounts~ purchase any 3 patterns & receive 20% off use coupon code save20 purchase any 5 patterns & receive 30% off use coupon code save30 purchase any 10 patterns & receive 40% off use coupon code save40** coffee sleeve is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity & craftsy jennifer pionk
